thread.title: UT player transported to hospital, released
thread.title_full: UT player transported to hospital, released

title: UT player transported to hospital, released
text:
UT player transported to hospital, released Updated: Tue 9:13 PM, Oct 13, 2015 / Headlines List / Article KNOXVILLE,TN - JULY 31, 2015 - Running back John Kelly #4 of the Tennessee Volunteers 2015 Football Head Shot. Photo By Craig Bisacre/Tennessee Athletics 
KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (WVLT)-- Senior Associate Athletic Director for Communications, Ryan Robinson, stated Tuesday afternoon that UT freshman John Kelly was transported to a local hospital for precautionary evaluation and was released. 
Kelly, a freshman from Detroit, has 21 carries for 88 yards in a reserve role this season. He recovered a fumble on a kickoff return to set up a touchdown in Tennessee's 38-31 victory over Georgia last week. 
Tennessee (3-3, 1-2 SEC) has this week off before visiting No. 10 Alabama (5-1, 2-1) on Oct. 24.
